course.title: ADM 3302 Supply Chain Management (3 units)
course.desc: Study of supply chain management and of its impact on the competitive success and profitability of modern organizations. The integration of information and materials flows across multiple organizations. The roles of business logistics functions, including forecasting and planning, procurement, purchasing, inventory management, warehousing and materials handling, transportation management, and after sales service and customer relationships in the integrated supply chain. Issues of global logistics and reverse logistics.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: ADM 3301.
